Description:
You've got this!
Getting into your first home or investment is easy when the property is priced right and this new listing offers better value than most in the price range.
The well-located home with neat front garden offers side porch entry to the gas-heated lounge, three bedrooms, central bathroom and updated kitchen featuring stainless steel gas/electric cooking appliances, dishwasher and plenty of storage in gloss white cabinetry including corner pantry.
A large family room equipped with gas wall furnace and wall-mounted air conditioner opens off the kitchen with a renovated laundry and WC alongside.
Outside, there's a covered area at the rear for outdoor living while the large, secure backyard includes various garden sheds, rainwater tanks and single carport.
Located on approx. 695m² allotment, this property is close to Bunnings, Centro Lansell Shopping Centre, Rocklea Home Centre, Kangaroo Flat shopping strip and public transport.
Call for an inspection today.
Internal area
120m²

Description:
Rosedale Retirement Village
Located a short stroll to Lansell Square shopping centre, this secure home has all the mod cons and the bonus of a shaded private outdoor area. Entering from the front porch you are greeted with a large open plan lounge/dining area that adjoins the kitchen with good storage space and full cooking facilities. Both bedrooms have built-in robes and are spotless, close by is the bathroom that features a large shower, vanity and IXL tastic while the toilet is separate. This home has been upgraded and feels like brand new with underfloor ducted gas heating, a Mitsubishi reverse cycle split system, stainless steel oven and cooktop and even the gas instant hot water is new.
Rosedale over 55's current weekly fee is $163.00, with eligible people potentially receiving up to $67.00 per week rent assistance ( single person ). The weekly fee includes council rates, water & rubbish removal ( fees quoted are approximate and subject to change ).
With undercover parking for a car and a smartly built in garden shed there is room for additional storage of those bulky items. To inspect the property please contact Nathan Diss on 0448 010 057.

Description:
COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE
Soak up the lifestyle offerings and comfort in this light and bright updated and modern family home ideal for first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike.
The moment you step into the well-manicured front yard and up to the large undercover front patio you'll start to feel how well cared for and beautifully presented this property is.
Walk through the formal entry and instantly feel the welcoming space with fresh timber vinyl plank flooring and neutral colour palette complimenting the home's modern fit out.
The master suite at the front of the home invites comfort and practicality with its large walk in robe, dual blinds and an impressive contemporary ensuite boasting a large walk in shower and modern tiling.
Create endless hours of memories baking and cooking with the family in your beautifully presented refurbished kitchen boasting high end appliances, double sink, decorative splash backs and walk-in pantry. It's peace of mind keeping an eye on the kids with the kitchen's backyard views also providing plenty of natural light.
Features a generous lounge room with study area that offers flexible uses and views to the front and rear yards.
The remaining two bedrooms offer large built-in robes, dual blinds, feature walls, ceiling fans and are serviced by the home's main bathroom - also completely refreshed and boasts a back to wall freestanding bath tub.
On a sunny afternoon invite friends around under your large paved and undercover entertaining patio while the kids run around the colorbond secure backyard which also features a 4.5m by 3m concrete floor and powered workshop.
Unique to this property is its rear yard access through the carport and double gates, ideal for storing your boat, caravan or additional cars.
Complementing the appeal of this home is its idyllic quiet location; an easy 1.5 hour commute to Melbourne or a short walk to Kangaroo Flat central, Healthworks, Lansell Square and to the new Aquatic and Wellbeing Center Gurri Wanyarra via the Bendigo Creek Trail.

Description:
Feature Packed Home in Sought After Locale
Brilliantly positioned and boasting a lovely aspect over this sought-after pocket of Kangaroo Flat, this sturdy Graeme Pilcher built brick home offers an exciting opportunity to leap into the property market as an investor or 1st home buyer. The inviting interior features three bedroom with BIRs, a good-sized lounge room with views across the neighbourhood, a well-equipped kitchen with gas cooking and masses of storage and a central renovated bathroom. The rear garden is family-friendly with plenty of room to create your ideal outdoor space. It also offers a large double car garage, tandem carport, pergola and a garden shed. Positioned in a highly sought-after part of Kangaroo Flat, only a short drive to shops, schools and public transport this appealing home won't last long. Move in today or lease the property, this could be your ideal investment, rental appraisal at $350 p/w. Properties in this area are selling fast.. Be quick!

Description:
Large Living with Low-Maintenance
Situated in a quiet location this low maintenance home offers modern features throughout and perfectly suited for first home buyers, investors, young families or the downsizer.
This well-designed surprisingly big townhouse offers generous space and a versatile layout. Boasting three great sized bedrooms with built in robes, two spacious bathrooms, fantastic modern kitchen sporting stone breakfast island and benchtops, glass splashbacks and quality stainless steel appliances including gas cooking, rangehood and dishwasher. Main bedroom comes complete with built-in wardrobes and a great sized ensuite with stylish glass splashbacks.
With two huge living rooms, you'll be able to enjoy split living in complete comfort. Second living opening up to the outdoor decking ideal for entertaining and evening dining on those balmy summer nights.
There is also a generous laundry, a single lock up garage with internal access. Heating and cooling is taken care of with ducted gas heating and a reverse cycle split system in the main living/kitchen/dining zone.
This neat, tidy and pleasantly spacious unit is a must to inspect! Investors will be delighted by the attractive returns of $310 per week in which the current tenants are paying whilst taking good care of the property!
Situated less than 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD this property is a fantastic find, all amenities are at your doorstep with ALDI, Chemist Warehouse and Medical facilities just around the corner you will not have to travel far.

Description:
Unit with Space and Location to impress
Walk to Lansell Square, public transport, medical clinics and Kangaroo Flat shops, where you have established National brand stores like Bunnings and Aldi supermarket. Offering a superb opportunity for those looking to downsize or get into the market, as well as being primed for investors. One of 3 on the lot and the most private unit tucked to the rear of the complex, it is in need of a quick once over to make it feel like home again, but the inviting property has loads of space both inside and out.
Comprising 2 bedrooms, a huge open kitchen/meals/family room, Euro laundry and 3-piece bathroom.
The timber kitchen has good cupboard storage, plus built-in robes are in both bedrooms.
Split system unit and gas wall furnace for comfort.
Outside you own minimal garden, secure enclosed carport and much, much more.
The unit is on the right side of the Calder highway heading to Melbourne, and Kangaroo Flat train station is just minutes away.

Description:
ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES
This beautifully updated 3 bedroom weatherboard home is positioned on a usable 1,017sq metre block. With a spacious a double carport at front of the property to the double gates that allow access to a 9.0 m X 6.0 m garage powered workshop with concrete floor. The timber decking enjoys a sunny aspect, overlooking the landscaped inground pool and entertaining area.
Open plan living with modern conveniences will ensure a comfortable lifestyle.
The facilities of Kangaroo Flat, including train station, Lansell Plaza Shopping Centre, schools and sporting facilities are all within walking distance to this very comfortable home.
Inside features:
Large main bedroom with Built in robes
2 additional bedrooms with Built in robes
Open plan kitchen, meals & living area
Kitchen with updated appliances
Ducted gas heating
Quality finishes throughout
Outside Features:
Private backyard with in ground pool
9.0 m x 6.0 m garage / workshop
Large timber deck for entertaining
Fully landscaped yard with secure fencing
Why build when you can purchase a quality home on a huge allotment rarely found these days!

Description:
A Home full of Space and Love
Stylish with a free-flowing floor plan that will please so many different buyers, is this perfectly presented and located family home. If you are looking for value and are on a budget, this home offers so much. 3 bedrooms, study, kitchen/meals, separate lounge, and a sizeable multipurpose room to the rear to accommodate whatever your lifestyle desires. Kitchen with a touch of French provincial, plus bathroom with separate shower, bath and vanity.
Ducted heating and split system also included. Outside is a great sized yard, storage shed and generous side access.
Minutes to bus, schools, local shops and Kangaroo Flat's new swimming complex.

Description:
MODERN CONTEMPORARY STYLE TOWNHOUSE
This as-new townhouse is spacious, has both a single car under roof line garage with auto roller door but uniquely has room for a caravan/trailer/boat or two more cars on the side of the property. Fully fenced Colorbond with a landscaped front and rear yard. This lovely property boasts a full width timber decking with glass panel fencing at the rear, ideal to soak up the sun, enjoy breakfast or have a family BBQ. This area plus the extra parking are great assets. Main bedroom with full built-in robes and split system, tiled front entry that opens to the large kitchen. Enter via the multi textured front portico into meals and lounge area that overlooks the rear patio timber deck. The central kitchen has an island bench with dishwasher and stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, electric oven, rangehood and pantry. The second bedroom with full built-in robes, bathroom with shower, bath and vanity and separate adjacent toilet. Internal access to the garage and European laundry complete this great floor plan. Walk to Kangaroo Flat train station and High Street shops. No maintenance and modern with a pleasing design. This unit has loads of appeal.
Insights: 24 other 2 bedroom unit in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Potential Plus - Cream Brick Home on 766m2 (approx)
This solid property is in original condition with updated carpets throughout. It presents a great opportunity for first home buyers wanting to value add with some renovation work over time. The front entry opens into the lounge which is a fantastic size & contains a gas wall furnace, air conditioner & ceiling fan. This leads through to the kitchen/dining space, which features a wall full of built in storage & a bar heater. A sliding door opens to the laundry, also offering built in cupboards. The long hallway leads to three spacious bedrooms with the main containing built in robes & a ceiling fan. The third bedroom also has a built in robe. A retro bathroom features a shower, bath, vanity & bar heater with a separate toilet & linen press adjacent. Outside you will find a single carport & garage, a water tank & abundant space for pets or children to play or possibly the addition of extra shedding. Just a stone's throw from the train station & Kangaroo Flat shopping strip as well as schools, transport & the new Wellbeing Centre, the location is ideal.

Address: 2 Forest Heights Drive Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Quality Speaks for Itself
Located at the end of a private and quiet cul-de-sac, this beautiful Glen Loddon home is warm and welcoming. The large open plan living areas flow seamlessly out to a covered pergola and family friendly backyard. For year-round comfort, the home offers ducted refrigerated heating and cooling split into 6 separate zoned areas. Overlooking parkland and surrounded by quality homes, there is nothing to do but enjoy.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with his/hers walk through robe and ensuite
Two separate living areas
3 other bedrooms with built-in robes
Open kitchen with generous fridge space
6 zone ducted refrigerated cooling and heating
2 door linen press plus further 4 door storage
Outside Features:
Extra large double garage with auto door
Quality landscaping and secure fencing
Large pergola for entertaining
Garden shed, raised vegetable gardens and established fruit trees
5KW solar panels
A beautifully presented home in a quiet location still within close proximity to schools, recreational facilities and all conveniences.
